body.name: Curel Ultra Healing Lotion, Hand and Body Moisturizer for Extra Dry Skin, with Advanced Ceramide Complex and Hydrating Agents, for Tight Skin, 20 Ounces
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 15 mins
features: DRY SKIN RELIEF - Clinically proven to relieve and repair extra-dry skin 2 times better than the leading intensive lotion
ALL DAY MOISTURIZER - Provides instant dry skin relief that lasts for over 24 hours
RESTORE MOISTURE - Contains extra-strength, naturally hydrating agents to help even the driest, tightest skin feel soft, supple and restored
NON GREASY MOISTURIZER - Non-greasy formula absorbs quickly and won't clog pores
SKIN REPAIR - With Advanced Ceramide Complex, the lotion restores skin's ceramide levels to help retain moisture and prevent symptoms of dry, tight skin from returning
body.description: Instantly relieve severely dry, tight skin and keep it hydrated for 24 hours with Curél Ultra Healing Intensive Body Lotion for Extra-Dry, Tight Skin. While traditional body lotions only hydrate the skin's surface, Curél Ultra Healing Lotion works at the source of dryness & helps repair it's moisture barrier. With Advanced Ceramide Complex, the lotion helps replenishes ceramides, helps skin retain moisture, and helps prevent dry, tight skin from returning. Curél Ultra Healing Lotion is proven to relieve and repair extra-dry skin two times better than the leading intensive lotion. Dermatologist recommended, Curél Ultra Healing Lotion by Kao USA is non-greasy & absorbs quickly. Skin is left soft, supple and restored. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Curél Ultra Healing Lotion Instantly relieves severely dry, tight skin and keep it hydrated for over 24 hours with Curél Ultra Healing Lotion. While traditional body lotions only hydrate the skin's surface, Curél Ultra Healing lotion works within the skin to repair its moisture barrier. With extra-strength hydrating ingredients, Curél Ultra Healing Lotion is clinically proven to relieve and repair extra-dry skin.

Curél Advanced Ceramide Complex Healthy skin with ceramides. Ceramides are naturally present in healthy skin and act as the glue to hold skin cells together, serve as a protective barrier and help to maintain skin's moisture. Unhealthy skin with depleted ceramide levels. When ceramides are lost due to factors such as aging, sun exposure, and other factors, skin can become damaged, dry and irritated. Curél moisturizers contain a proprietary Ceramide Complex. Curél moisturizers with exclusive Ceramide Complex, help restore skin's ceramide levels and penetrate to the source of dryness to repair dry skin's moisture barrier leaving skin hydrated and healthy-looking.

Curél Ultra Healing Lotion Curél Hydra Therapy Wet Skin Moisturizer Curél Dry Skin Therapy Hydra Silk Moisturizer Curél Daily Healing Lotion Curél Fragrance Free Lotion Curél Itch Defense Lotion Skin Type For Extra Dry, Tight Skin For Dry or Extra-Dry Skin For Dry or Extra-Dry Skin For Dry Skin For Dry, Sensitive Skin For Dry, Itchy Skin Fragrance No Added Fragrance No Added Fragrance No Added Fragrance Non-Irritating Fragrance Fragrance Free Fragrance Free Benefit The intensive formula contains extra-strength, naturally hydrating agents to help even the driest skin. Clinically proven to repair and renew extra-dry skin. The water-activated formula uses the water on freshly showered skin to deliver hydration and ceramides like never before. The non-greasy formula absorbs in seconds leaving your skin feeling silky-smooth and provides 24 hour moisturization for healthy feeling skin all day. The non-greasy formula absorbs quickly and is clinincally proven to provide 24 hours of continuous moisturizing. Gentle enough to use on face. The hypo-allergenic fomrula is great for sensitive skin. It is non-greasy and absorbs quickly. Gentle enough to use on face. The safe and effective formula hydrates to instantly relieves dry, itchy skin and is suitable for eczema prone skin. Gentle enough for babies 6 months and up. Key Ingredients With Advanced Ceramide Complex, Shea Butter & Oatmeal Extract With Advanced Ceramide Complex, Shea Butter, Pro-vitamin B5 & Eucalyptus Leaf Extract With Advanced Ceramide Complex and Aloe Water With Advanced Ceramide Complex & Shea Butter With Advanced Ceramide Complex With Advanced Ceramide Complex, Pro-vitamin B5 & Shea Butter

Curél is on a mission to end dry skin. At Curél Skincare, we believe when people finally find relief from the distraction of their dry skin, they are able to more fully engage in life and do some truly amazing things. That's why Curél Skincare is on a mission to end dry skin, for good. This mission is what compelled Curél scientists to gain unparalleled knowledge of what happens in the skin when it becomes dry. They found that ceramides, the moisture-retaining molecules within the skin, are vital to healthy skin. When ceramides are lost, skin becomes dry and damaged. This is what drove us to develop our Advanced Ceramide Complex and include it in all Curél moisturizers. Our moisturizers work at the source of dryness, helping replenish skin's ceramide levels, for restored and hydrated skin. We can't wait to see what incredible things can be accomplished with dry skin worries behind you! Curél, the end of dry skin, the beginning of so much more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not to heavy, not too light - pleasantly perfect
reviews.reviewText: You know when you have a nice thick cream and you put it all over and then you get hot? Or the light lotions that really don’t feel like they moisturize at all? Well, this is pleasantly in the middle and just right. My skin feels soft, moisturized, and it works. It REALLY helps dry skin. I even use this on my feet after every shower and my skin feels great and feet don’t get hot.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Jumbo size will last you a year or better
reviews.reviewText: I'm aging and my skin gets dry nowadays. This formula is really good at keeping skin moist. Got tired of listening to my skin 'crinkling' at night. (Wrinkles) Amd it has no scent, it's rich and creamy and thick. 😎

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well for my skin
reviews.reviewText: Came with broken pump even tho they double tapped it. 1/8 th in the package. Not the fault.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry skin and found this to be the perfect antidote. It's not greasy (no gunk on your clothes, etc.) and is, as described, without any cloying fragrance. In short, it does what it claims to: acts as the perfect emollient. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great container for olive oil
reviews.reviewText: After dealing with olive oil dripping down the side of the bottle I found this container, which not only solves the issue of dripping but it’s much easier to hold.
no queda sensacion grasosa muy recomendable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This keeps my skin so nice and moisturised for a good whole day until I’m ready to use again. I love this for real. Price fair because of the quality but whew- I wouldn’t be mad if it can be on sale often lol

Un muy buen kit para los niños que gustan de los cochecitos, a mi hijo de 3 años le encanta y es uno de los mejores pasatiempos que he encontrado para hacer con él. La caja venía un poco maltratada pero los juntamos con las piezas de otro set para guardarlas.
